definitions.definition: Any of a group of narrow-spectrum antibiotics obtained from Penicillium molds or synthesized , that have a beta-lactam structure and are active against gram-positive bacteria and used in the treatment of various infections and diseases .
A blue mold of the genus Penicillium that produces penicillin.

main_definition: ( pharmacology ) Any of a group of narrow-spectrum antibiotics obtained from Penicillium molds or synthesized , that have a beta-lactam structure and are active against gram-positive bacteria and used in the treatment of various infections and diseases .
secondary_definitions: ( mycology ) A blue mold of the genus Penicillium that produces penicillin.
